items.sentence: I'm not kidding you. Some people actually believe that the world is only six thousand years old.
If you ask a mathematician if he is an adult or a minor, don't be surprised if he answers "yes".
Tom has three daughters. Each of his daughters has one brother. How many children does Tom have?
Memorizing the order of a deck of playing cards is definitely not easy, but it\'s not impossible.
Tom\'s an irritating person to work with because he\'ll never admit it when he\'s made a mistake.
